summary: Utility module that implements Snowflake User‑Defined Functions for the Feast feature store, handling conversion of Snowflake native types and arrays into Feast protobuf value messages and serializing entity keys for feature lookups within Snowpark.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless integration of Feast feature retrieval and transformation logic into Snowflake Snowpark pipelines by providing ready‑to‑use UDFs that translate Snowflake data into Feast-compatible formats.
